flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Un Pokémon très intelligent. Ilnpeut voler plus vite qu’un avion ànréaction en repliant ses ailes.
LATIOS has the ability to make its foensee an image of what it has seen ornimagines in its head.fThis POKéMON is intelligent andnunderstands human speech.
LATIOS will only open its heart to anTRAINER with a compassionate spirit.nThis POKéMON can fly faster than a jetfplane by folding its forelegs to minimizenair resistance.
Even in hiding, it can detect the locationsnof others and sense their emotions sincenit has telepathy. Its intelligence allowsnit to understand human languages.
It has a docile temperament and dislikesnfighting. Tucking in its forelegs, it cannfly faster than a jet plane.
It has a docile temperament and dislikesnfighting. Tucking in its forelegs, it cannfly faster than a jet plane.
A highly intelligent Pokémon.nBy folding back its wings in flight,nit can overtake jet planes.
A highly intelligent Pokémon.nBy folding back its wings in flight,nit can overtake jet planes.
A highly intelligent Pokémon.nBy folding back its wings in flight,nit can overtake jet planes.
It understands human speech and isnhighly intelligent. It is a tendernPokémon that dislikes fighting.
It understands human speech and isnhighly intelligent. It is a tendernPokémon that dislikes fighting.
A highly intelligent Pokémon.nBy folding back its wings in flight,nit can overtake jet planes.
Un Pokémon très intelligent. Ilnpeut voler plus vite qu’un avion ànréaction en repliant ses ailes.
A highly intelligent Pokémon.nBy folding back its wings in flight,nit can overtake jet planes.
A highly intelligent Pokémon.nBy folding back its wings in flight,nit can overtake jet planes.
A highly intelligent Pokémon.nBy folding back its wings in flight,nit can overtake jet planes.
たかい　ちのうを　もつ　ポケモン。nうでを　おりたたんで　とべばnジェットきを　おいこす　スピードだ。
높은 지능을 가진 포켓몬이다.n팔을 접어 날면 제트기를n추월할 만큼 빠르다.
Un Pokémon très intelligent. Il peut voler plus vitenqu’un avion à réaction en repliant ses ailes.
Ein hochintelligentes Pokémon. Wenn es im Flugnseine Flügel nach hinten legt, ist es schneller alsnein Jet.
Es un Pokémon muy inteligente. Puede adelantar anaviones a reacción plegando las alas.
Pokémon molto intelligente. Ripiegando indietronle ali, riesce a volare più veloce di un jet.
A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back itsnwings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
高い　知能を　持つ　ポケモン。n腕を　折りたたんで　飛べばnジェット機を　追い越す　スピードだ。
たかい　ちのうを　もち　にんげんのnことばを　りかいする。あらそいをnきらう　やさしい　ポケモンだ。
높은 지능을 가졌기 때문에 인간의n말을 이해한다. 다툼을n싫어하는 상냥한 포켓몬이다.
Un Pokémon très intelligent qui comprend le langagenhumain. Il déteste se battre.
Es ist hochintelligent und versteht sogar dienmenschliche Sprache. Es ist friedlich undnmeidet Konflikte.
Es muy inteligente y entiende el lenguaje humano.nEs un Pokémon muy dócil y no le gusta nada combatir.
Dotato di grande intelligenza, capisce il linguaggionumano. Pacifico, non ama combattere.
It understands human speech and is highlynintelligent. It is a tender Pokémon thatndislikes fighting.
高い　知能を　持ちn人間の　言葉を　理解する。n争いを　嫌う　優しい　ポケモンだ。
みた　ものや　かんがえた　イメージを　あいてにnえいぞうとして　みせる　のうりょくを　もつ。nにんげんの　ことばを　りかいすることが　できる。
본 것이나 생각한 이미지를 상대에게n영상으로 보여주는 능력을 지녔다.n인간의 말을 이해할 수 있다.
Latios a le pouvoir de faire voir à une personne une imagenprovenant de son subconscient. Ce Pokémon est intelligentnet comprend le langage humain.
Latios kann seinem Gegenüber ein Bild von etwas, das esneinmal gesehen hat, in den Kopf projizieren. Dieses Pokémonnist intelligent und es versteht die menschliche Sprache.
Latios tiene la habilidad de hacer que los demás vean algo quenél ha visto o imaginado. Este Pokémon es muy inteligente. Esncapaz de entender el lenguaje humano.
Latios ha l’abilità di far vedere agli altri l’immagine di ciò chenha visto o immaginato nella propria testa. Questo Pokémonnè intelligente e capisce il linguaggio umano.
Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what itnhas seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligentnand understands human speech.
見た　ものや　考えた　イメージを　相手にn映像として　見せる　能力を　持つ。n人間の　言葉を　理解することが　できる。
やさしい　こころの　もちぬしにしか　なつかない。nうでを　おりたたむと　くうきていこうが　へってnジェットき　よりも　はやく　そらを　とべるぞ。
상냥한 마음씨를 가진 자만을 따른다.n팔을 접으면 공기저항이 줄어n제트기보다 빠르게 하늘을 난다.
Latios n’ouvrira son cœur qu’à un Dresseur doté d’un espritncompatissant. Ce Pokémon peut voler plus vite qu’un avionnà réaction en repliant ses pattes avant pour améliorernson aérodynamisme.
Latios schüttet nur seinem Trainer gegenüber sein Herz aus.nDieses Pokémon fliegt schneller als ein Flugzeug, indem esnseine Vorderbeine einklappt, um den Luftwiderstand zunverringern.

Latios solo le abre el corazón a los Entrenadores compasivos.nA la hora de volar, este Pokémon pliega las patas delanterasnpara minimizar la resistencia al aire y supera en velocidad a unnavión a reacción.
Latios apre il proprio cuore ad Allenatori d’animo buonone generoso. Il Pokémon riesce a volare più veloce di unnaereo a reazione, piegando le zampe anteriori per minimizzarenl’attrito dell’aria.
Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with ancompassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than anjet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.
優しい　心の　持ち主にしか　なつかない。n腕を　折り畳むと　空気抵抗が　減ってnジェット機　よりも　速く　空を　飛べるぞ。
